general.name: mwmVisit
general.short: BOSS and/or APOGEE spectra for each visit of a single star. These are the data produced before analysis by any of the astra pipelines.
general.description: Individual spectra for a MWM source from BOSS, the APOGEE instrument at Apache Point Observatory, and the APOGEE instrument on the du Pont telescope at Las Campanas Observatory. These spectra are stacked to generate an mwmStar file, though note that bad spectra are excluded (see the IN_STACK for HDUs 1-4).

surveys.name: MWM
surveys.description: A time-domain, optical+IR spectroscopic survey of Milky Way stars of all types.

releases.name: WORK
releases.description: SDSS unreleased data.  Represents any work-in-progress data.

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another
